name: part_009
file: tmp_【＃癒月ちょこ生誕祭2023】ちょこ先生はてぇてぇに囲まれたい【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [r8DrUubFFCQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Choco, Mio, and Fubuki are in a forest setting. Choco begins grooming Mio and Fubuki, treating them like pets and offering them a life of 'benefits' at her home. Mio and Fubuki realize the danger and flee.
Choco reflects on their escape and addresses the viewers before transitioning to her solo stage performance.
Yuzuki Choco performs her solo song on stage.

subtitles.original: どうすればいいんだ、これ
subtitles.english: What should we do about this?

subtitles.original: え〜、なんだろう、なんだろう
subtitles.english: Hmm, what could it be, what could it be?

subtitles.original: 毛づくろいでもしようか、じゃあ
subtitles.english: Shall we do some grooming then?

subtitles.original: 毛づくろいでもしようか
subtitles.english: Shall we do some grooming?

subtitles.original: あら〜、毛づくろいよ、毛づくろいよ、じゃあ
subtitles.english: Oh, grooming time, grooming time then.

subtitles.original: よしよしよし、よしよしよし…
subtitles.english: There, there, there, there, there, there...

subtitles.original: ミオのすごいからね、もう、あれ
subtitles.english: Mio's is amazing, you know, that thing.

subtitles.original: すごいからね、もう
subtitles.english: It's amazing, already.

subtitles.original: あれ？なんかペットみたいな扱いじゃないですか？
subtitles.english: Wait? Aren't we being treated like pets?

subtitles.original: 悪くはないですが
subtitles.english: It's not bad, though.

subtitles.original: え、もしかして、うちらのことペットだと思ってますか？
subtitles.english: Wait, by any chance, do you think of us as pets?

subtitles.original: え、もしかして、今日チョコの家に来てくれるんですか？
subtitles.english: Eh, could it be you're coming to Choco's house today?

subtitles.original: え〜、そんな、そんな
subtitles.english: Oh, no way, no way.

subtitles.original: やばい、お持ち帰りされるこれ
subtitles.english: This is bad, we're being taken home.

subtitles.original: ペットとして迎えられるこれ
subtitles.english: We're being welcomed as pets.

subtitles.original: てか今日のゲストなんか、やたらケモ耳多かった気がしないでもないな
subtitles.english: I can't help but feel there were a lot of beast ears among today's guests.

subtitles.original: あ、そういうこと？
subtitles.english: Ah, is that it?

subtitles.original: そういうことか
subtitles.english: So that's it.

subtitles.original: やだ、でもチョコ、可愛いものには、ちょっと貢ぎ体質で、お世話したくなっちゃって
subtitles.english: No, but Choco has a bit of a giving nature for cute things and just wants to take care of them.

subtitles.original: やばい、チョコにお世話されるの…
subtitles.english: This is bad, being taken care of by Choco...

subtitles.original: チョコのご飯美味しいよね
subtitles.english: Choco's food is delicious, isn't it?

subtitles.original: ペット…やべ、ペット…チョコのご飯食べれる…
subtitles.english: Pet... wait, pet... we get to eat Choco's food...

subtitles.original: あ、でもチョコのご飯、美味しい、美味しいけど
subtitles.english: Ah, but Choco's food is delicious, delicious but...

subtitles.original: お腹満たされるけど
subtitles.english: It fills our bellies, but...

subtitles.original: 三食昼寝付きが保証されて、チョコの朝昼晩の手料理がついてて
subtitles.english: Three meals and a nap are guaranteed, with Choco's home cooking for breakfast, lunch, and dinner...

subtitles.original: あ、それは食べたい…まま、美味しいけど、でも…
subtitles.english: Ah, I want to eat that... well, it's delicious, but...

subtitles.original: お風呂もちゃんと入れてあげるから
subtitles.english: I'll give you a bath properly too.

subtitles.original: お〜、でもちょっと、あの、狐と狼はペットに向かないので、大丈夫です
subtitles.english: Oh, but foxes and wolves aren't really suited to being pets, so we're okay.

subtitles.original: そうですね、向かないので
subtitles.english: That's right, we're not suited for it.

subtitles.original: やだ、悪魔だからそんなの関係ないわ
subtitles.english: No, I'm a demon, so that doesn't matter.

subtitles.original: やばい
subtitles.english: This is bad.

subtitles.original: どうしようこれ、逃げたほうがいいんじゃないこれ
subtitles.english: What should we do? Shouldn't we run away?

subtitles.original: 捕まったら大変
subtitles.english: It'll be bad if we get caught!

subtitles.original: 身ぐるみ剥がされちゃう
subtitles.english: We'll be stripped of everything!

subtitles.original: やばい、やばい、逃げろー！
subtitles.english: Bad, bad, run away!

subtitles.original: あ、待って、ちょっと待って！あ〜
subtitles.english: Ah, wait, wait a minute! Ah...

subtitles.original: 逃げられちゃった
subtitles.english: They ran away.

subtitles.original: おかしいな、チョコ、ちょっといい福利厚生用意したと思ったんだけどな
subtitles.english: That's strange. Choco thought I prepared some pretty good benefits.

subtitles.original: しょうがない
subtitles.english: Well, can't be helped.

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、この後はね
subtitles.english: Alright, so after this...

subtitles.original: ま、ここでゲストパートは終わりなのですが
subtitles.english: Well, the guest part ends here, but...

subtitles.original: まだまだ重大発表残っているので、お楽しみに！
subtitles.english: There are still major announcements left, so look forward to it!

subtitles.original: みんなは逃げないでね
subtitles.english: Don't you guys run away.

subtitles.original: そのまま、ちゃんといい子に待っててね
subtitles.english: Stay there and wait like good kids.

subtitles.original: またね
subtitles.english: See you later.

subtitles.original:
どりーみんチュチュ
作詞・作曲 emon(Tes.)
subtitles.english:
Dreamin' Chuchu
Lyrics/Composition: emon(Tes.)

subtitles.original: 恋心 実らせた
subtitles.english: My love has borne fruit

subtitles.original: 純情可憐な女の子
subtitles.english: A pure and lovely girl

subtitles.original: 目の下クマクマ コンシーラー
subtitles.english: Dark circles under my eyes, concealer

subtitles.original: あ、なんてったって今日はバレンタイン
subtitles.english: Ah, after all today is Valentine's

subtitles.original: 鈍いあいつもチラチラ
subtitles.english: Even that dense guy is glancing

subtitles.original: さすがに意識してるみたい
subtitles.english: It seems he's finally noticed

subtitles.original: 火の無い二人に火を灯せ
subtitles.english: Light a fire for the two of us without fire

subtitles.original: 今日はそうだね 特別な日さ
subtitles.english: That's right, today is a special day

subtitles.original: ドリーみんチュチュ チョコラタタタ
subtitles.english: Dreamin' Chuchu Choco-la-ta-ta-ta

subtitles.original: スウィートな魔法を君だけに
subtitles.english: A sweet magic just for you

subtitles.original: ドリーみんチュチュ チョコラタタタ
subtitles.english: Dreamin' Chuchu Choco-la-ta-ta-ta

subtitles.original: そのハートに届けたいな
subtitles.english: I want to reach that heart

subtitles.original: ドリーみんチュチュ チョコラタタタ
subtitles.english: Dreamin' Chuchu Choco-la-ta-ta-ta

subtitles.original: ビターな甘さで包んでね
subtitles.english: Envelop it in bitter sweetness

subtitles.english: Dreamin' Chuchu Choco-la-ta-ta-ta

subtitles.english: Choco-la-ta-ta-ta

subtitles.original: チョコラタタタ
subtitles.english: Choco-la-ta-ta-ta

subtitles.original: 放課後 屋上で待ち合わせ
subtitles.english: Meeting up on the rooftop after school

subtitles.original: ドキドキ 鼓動が高鳴る
subtitles.english: My heart is pounding fast

subtitles.original: 階段 昇る君の足音が
subtitles.english: The sound of your footsteps coming up the stairs

subtitles.original: 私の体を震わせた
subtitles.english: Made my body tremble

subtitles.original: 向かい合う二人
subtitles.english: The two of us facing each other

subtitles.original: ドリーみんチュチュ チョコラタタタ
subtitles.english: Dreamin' Chuchu Choco-la-ta-ta-ta
